class.name: VisualShaderNodeBillboard
class.brief_description: A node that controls how the object faces the camera to be used within the visual shader graph.
class.description: The output port of this node needs to be connected to [code]Model View Matrix[/code] port of [VisualShaderNodeOutput].

members.member: Controls how the object faces the camera. See [enum BillboardType].
If [code]true[/code], the shader will keep the scale set for the mesh. Otherwise, the scale is lost when billboarding.

constants.constant: Billboarding is disabled and the node does nothing.
A standard billboarding algorithm is enabled.
A billboarding algorithm to rotate around Y-axis is enabled.
A billboarding algorithm designed to use on particles is enabled.
Represents the size of the [enum BillboardType] enum.
